titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Pony Express National Historic Trail as a component of the National Trails System.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 7/7/1988--Introduced. Amends the National Trails Systems Act to designate the Pony Express National Historic Trail, extending from Saint Joseph, Missouri, through Kansas, Nebraska, Colorado, Wyoming, Utah, and Nevada to Sacramento, California, as a component of the National Trails System.
